mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_PAY_FLOW_LIST_HIS SELECT ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_DES, MER_NO, SEC_MER_NO, SR_FLAG, SYS_DATE, TRANS_SUB_SEQ, ROUTE_CODE, PAY_USER_ID, PAYER_ACCT_TYPE, PAYER_ACCT_NO, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_ORG_NAME, PAYER_BANK_NO, PAYER_BANK_NAME, PAYEE_ACCT_TYPE, PAYEE_ACCT_NO, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_ORG_NAME, PAYEE_BANK_NO, PAYEE_BANK_NAME, CCY, TRANS_AMT, FEE_AMT, TRANS_STAT, ROUTE_TRANS_STAT, TRANS_TIME, ROUTE_DATE, ROUTE_SEQ, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, CHK_FLAG, CHK_BATCH_NO, CHK_DATE, OPEN_ID, CLEAR_FLAG, CLEAR_BATCH_NO, CLEAR_DATE, SEQ_NO, SETTLE_KEY FROM T_PAY_FLOW_LISTã€€ WHERE
SYS_DATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
